messages.message: Can Instabase be hosted on AWS Outposts? i.e having a partner in Turkey asking due to this announcement as having launched this offering in the region (https://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2024/01/aws-outposts-turkey/)
CC @Ashish would we be willing to support this?
@Matt Weaver i think this fits into "approved on exception basis" category as this will be a new type of deployment infra cc @shaunak

We do not have a deployment to an AWS outpost yet and there are always practical blockers.  If we do this, it should be worth enough to assign a team to it to work out the kinks.  Based on what I have seen, I would not sign up for it without an appropriately sized effort on our side.  Does this partner already have a lot of integration experience or are they more sales/solutions focused?
I won't sign up for this just yet.  We don't have enough resources to validate all the edge cases that we'll run into with this.
^ Given this, I assume the answer is a no to AWS Outposts for now
Yes, no to AWS Outposts for now.
